name: Grand Theft 7 Nueva City
description:
this action made for you !!!

Features *

STORE *

The game that presents the real life. You have 30 missions. Your mission is to stop all bad guys in the city. You have access to buy cars, change your costumes, jet pack, armor, God mode and upgrading armors and gadgets. So try to save the city. Your mission has begun!
